title: Custom Colors on Carolingian UI
content:
Version 2.10.0:

  • Custom Color Themes are Here! Many of you have been asking for this and I've been delaying as I was afraid of the color atrocities I would see done with this feature.
  • But alas, you win! You can now customize the color accents for Foundry UI, and if you are feeling adventurous, apply the secondary color to the backgrounds. Use wisely.
  • For the moment, the backgrounds only work for dark mode.

If you like this module, consider supporting me on Patreon with only $2 or $5 per month!

Join the discussion on Discord or visit the Github repository.
